AZURE: A blue colour on a coat of arms, represented in engraving by horizontal parallel lines.
COBALT: A chemical element (symbol Co) with an atomic number of 27: a hard, lustrous, silver-gray metal.
NAVY: A country's entire sea force, including ships and personnel.
PERIWINKLE: Any of several evergreen plants of the genus Vinca with blue or white flowers.
TURQUOISE: A sky-blue, greenish-blue, or greenish-gray semi-precious gemstone.
